column1: This product is a facial mask. you stir it and then apply it to your clean face and neck, Leave it on for 30 to 60 mins., then rinse off. The mask is white and it has a pleasant, subtle scent. Use 2-3 times per week. Enjoy this little luxury in the evening while watching a movie!

This is amazing. Going to order another jar soon. It has made acne scars and sores fade. Also made hyperpigmentation on my underarms and buttocks fade as well. And I love natural ingredients. I use on my face three times a week and my underarms everyday
This product works wonders!! It's an old school product and it lightens the skin as it promises. Thank you Concha Nacar.
